channel.title: [317] Help
channel.description:
So recently I have found a rsps that has a lot of good things that I like, but it has quite a few bad that I need fixed. If you know how to fix any of the following, please number it right, and put the coding and where it needs to be put for me. Thank you so much!!!!
1.emotes don't work 2.no quests 3.all skills don't work 4.combats work 5.certain skill capes, but not all, some are in certain stores 6.glory teleports don't work 7.stairs don't work 8.ladders don't work 9.not all doors open and close 10.do x amount when buying something, you lag and you only get, 1k max from the item you may be choosing more of, such as runes 11.but, when banking right amount comes out 12.most npc's talk doesn't work 13.no quests at all, how do you add a quest, the quest name, and the little pop up quest guide ingame 14.npc's noclip, and I can walk through like rocks and stuff 15.::ban doesn't work, ::unban doesn't work, how do I get them to work?

item.title: [317] Help
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

This is basically a request for someone to write your server for you. You’re going to have to do that yourself. If you need help with something specific, try posting again but showing some code so people will actually know how to help you.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Help
item.dc:creator: @ASDss ASDss
item.description:
@ASDss wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:3, topic:450804”]For quests, you type in client.java,

Quest quest = new Quest("0101100101101111011101010111001000100000011000010110111000100000011010010110010001101001011011110111010000101110");

Those numbers are a quest Id written by Jagex, real complicated stuff.[/quote]

Nice one, Your An Idiot… ^

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Help
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

For quests, you type in client.java,

Quest quest = new Quest("0101100101101111011101010111001000100000011000010110111000100000011010010110010001101001011011110111010000101110");

Those numbers are a quest Id written by Jagex, real complicated stuff.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Help
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

I’m honestly hoping this is a joke.

There is a tutorial for every single one of these things except for maybe the buy/sell x amount.

Read full topic
